a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball II

p.k: The Flakers / The Authority / The Pony / The Storm Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJo's overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Pony's Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmen's relationship and has to reunite them.
